alert.note: Alert for Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 6:40PM PST until January 10 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches for valley locations such as Susanville, and 4 to 8 inches generally west of US-395. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph, with gusts up to 65 mph in wind prone areas such as US-395. * WHERE...Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening commute. Very cold temperatures settling in Wednesday night may prolong travel issues into Thursday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
